chapters.title: Chapter 20:  The Golden Crane
chapters.info:
Gabrelle,
      p. 416â€”Aes Sedai of
      the Brown Ajah, now bonded to Logain Ablar via the
      Warder-like Wife Bond of the Asha'man.  She likes his attentions, and is
      much more of a wife to Logain than Toveine, the
      other woman bonded to him.  She has sooty green eyes.
      See also
      Ablar, Logain;
      Gazal, Toveine.
